subject: fix: differentiate install/PDF buttons, fix blank PDF export, add PWA update check
body:
- Install button: changed to app-install icon, always-visible "Install" label
- PDF button: changed to document icon, always-visible "PDF" label
- PDF export: use TAB_MAPPING for correct content containers (was looking up
  nonexistent tab-work/tab-health IDs), convert chart canvases to images before
  cloning, override dark theme colors for white background readability
- PWA: added "Check for Updates" button in Settings with manual service worker
  update check and status feedback

title: differentiate install/PDF buttons, fix blank PDF export, add PWA update check
